title: Satavahana University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Various Guest Faculty Posts
description: The Satavahana University has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Guest Faculty and Lab Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, M.Pharm, and D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the Satavahana University Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
